title: Mining Block I/O Traces for Cache Preloading with Sparse Temporal Non-parametric Mixture of Multivariate Poisson
abstract: Existing caching strategies, in the storage domain, though well suited to exploit short range spatio-temporal patterns, are unable to leverage long-range motifs for improving hitrates. Motivated by this, we investigate novel Bayesian non-parametric modeling(BNP) techniques for count vectors, to capture long range correlations for cache preloading, by mining Block I/O traces. Such traces comprise of a sequence of memory accesses that can be aggregated into high-dimensional sparse correlated count vector sequences.
